name: Tempura-ture
description:
Reeeally didn't want this theme, so I decided to be edgy and subversive (lolxd). You play a tempura-loving loose-cannon equipped with a multipurpose Tempura Batter Ray. Use it to solve puzzles and collect four delicious Shrimp Tempura. Bon appetit!

Pre-postmortem (6/18):

2 of the 3 days of my jam were interrupted by (real) work, but I'm proud of what I accomplished in such a short time. Plus I learned a ton from the experience. Including the importance of a good tutorial. I have a ton more ideas for the game, some that I already built or I'm in the process of building, so I expect to keep updating the game here and on GitHub.

Disclaimer:

Do not learn from this project. It was hastily made and barely holds together. With that in mind, the source code will be available if you want to check it out :)
